content.raw:
It looks like the answer is to create an imported target and set `IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG` and `IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE` to the debug and release library paths respectively. 

~~We might also want to set `IMPORTED_LOCATION` to some default for the sake of completeness.~~

From [CMake documentation](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.5/prop_tgt/IMPORTED_LOCATION.html):

> Projects may skip IMPORTED_LOCATION if the configuration-specific property IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> is set.
content.html:
It looks like the answer is to create an imported target and set IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG and IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE to the debug and release library paths respectively.

We might also want to set IMPORTED_LOCATION to some default for the sake of completeness.

From CMake documentation:

Projects may skip IMPORTED_LOCATION if the configuration-specific property IMPORTED_LOCATION_<CONFIG> is set.
